alert.note: Alert for Fountain; Parke; Vermillion (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 3:21PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Fountain, northwestern Parke and east central Vermillion Counties through 345 PM EDT ... At 321 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Newport, or 22 miles southeast of Danville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Fountain, northwestern Parke and east central Vermillion Counties, including the following locations... Kingman, Turkey Run State Park, and Yeddo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
